014package org.jdbi.v3.jpa;
015
016import java.lang.reflect.Constructor;
017import java.sql.ResultSet;
018import java.sql.SQLException;
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.List;
021
022import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.ColumnMapper;
023import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.NoSuchMapperException;
024import org.jdbi.v3.core.mapper.RowMapper;
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.qualifier.QualifiedType;
026import org.jdbi.v3.core.statement.StatementContext;
027import org.jdbi.v3.jpa.internal.JpaClass;
028import org.jdbi.v3.jpa.internal.JpaMember;
029
030/**
031 * Row mapper for a JPA-annotated type as a result.
032 * @param <C> the type to map
033 */
034public class JpaMapper<C> implements RowMapper<C> {
035
036    private final Class<C> clazz;
037    private final JpaClass<C> jpaClass;
038
039    JpaMapper(Class<C> clazz) {
040        this.clazz = clazz;
041        this.jpaClass = JpaClass.get(clazz);
042    }
043
044    @Override
045    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidAccessibilityAlteration")
046    public RowMapper<C> specialize(ResultSet rs, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
047        Constructor<C> constructor;
048        try {
049            constructor = clazz.getDeclaredConstructor();
050        } catch (ReflectiveOperationException e) {
051            throw new EntityMemberAccessException("Unable to get constructor for " + clazz, e);
052        }
053        constructor.setAccessible(true);
054
055        List<MemberSetter<C>> setters = new ArrayList<>();
056
057        for (int colIndex = rs.getMetaData().getColumnCount(); colIndex >= 1; colIndex--) {
058            String columnLabel = rs.getMetaData().getColumnLabel(colIndex);
059            JpaMember member = jpaClass.lookupMember(columnLabel);
060            if (member != null) {
061                QualifiedType<?> memberType = member.getQualifiedType();
062                ColumnMapper<?> columnMapper = ctx.findColumnMapperFor(memberType)
063                        .orElseThrow(() -> new NoSuchMapperException("No column mapper for " + memberType));
064
065                final int columnIndex = colIndex;
066                setters.add(obj -> member.write(obj, columnMapper.map(rs, columnIndex, ctx)));
067            }
068        }
069
070        return (r, c) -> {
071            C obj;
072            try {
073                obj = constructor.newInstance();
074            } catch (ReflectiveOperationException e) {
075                throw new EntityMemberAccessException("Unable to invoke " + constructor, e);
076            }
077            for (MemberSetter<C> setter : setters) {
078                setter.mapAndSetMember(obj);
079            }
080            return obj;
081        };
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public C map(ResultSet rs, StatementContext ctx) throws SQLException {
086        return specialize(rs, ctx).map(rs, ctx);
087    }
088
089    @FunctionalInterface
090    private interface MemberSetter<C> {
091        void mapAndSetMember(C object) throws SQLException;
092    }
093}
